title: DeviantArt can now notify anyone whose art’s been used in NFTs without permission
content:
There are plenty of instances in the Web3 world where projects feature stolen art that’s turned into NFTs without creators’ permission. DeviantArt, an online art and design community founded in 2000, is now opening up its NFT protection tool to everyone. Until now, that tool was available only to DeviantArt community members. But now any artist can sign up for it. Here’s what you get: the free version allows you to upload 10 images, and you’ll get alerts if anyone is using your art as an NFT. description: DeviantArt is making its NFT theft detection tool available for all creators. They can upload 10 images for free.
